item.title: ABC Cakes
item.description:
Freelance Project

ABC Cakes is local bakery startup based in Toronto by Beatrice Chau & her sister Alena Chau. ABC Cakesâ€™ identity focuses on a clean timeless design that speaks of the passion, elegance and ingredients of their baked goods & bakery.
